del.icio.us and Firefox

Posted on Monday, April 09, 2007

The guys over at del.icio.us have released a really cool Firefox plug-in that integrates the social bookmarking service into your browser. I’ve played with del.icio.us in the past, but the experience was never streamlined or fast; this plug-in is both. There is more explanation on the del.icio.us blog.
